text:
@piersmorgan @ChrisGiles_ I don't see why the excess deaths are relevant now Piers, you're only using it to make the figures look higher and more impressive or in this case depressing to suite your own agenda.

This is reality and ppl aren't stupid, we know ppl are dying outside of the Covid19 bubble.
